results.title: Regulation of glomerular heparanase expression by aldosterone, angiotensin II and reactive oxygen species.
results.text_hl: RESULTS: Treatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@, @CHEMICAL_Spironolactone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013148 @@@spironolactone@@@ or their combination significantly blunted the increased glomerular @GENE_HPSE @GENE_64537 @@@heparanase@@@ expression and restored the decreased HS expression in the @<m>DISEASE_Glioma</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005910 @@@GBM@@@.

citations.NLM: van den Hoven MJ, Waanders F, Rops AL, Kramer AB, van Goor H, Berden JH, Navis G, van der Vlag J. Regulation of glomerular heparanase expression by aldosterone, angiotensin II and reactive oxygen species. Nephrol Dial Transplant. 2009 Sep;24(9):2637-45. PMID: 19429930
